chapter.title: Decribing Beans
chapter.para: The BeanMetaData provides configuration used to deploy beans.
This is similar to the -service.xml files in JBoss4.

sect1.title: BeanMetaData - deploying a single bean
sect1.para: The BeanMetaData provides top level information and access to the more detailed information about the bean deployment.

sect1.title: ClassLoaderMetaData - configuring a classloader
sect1.para: The classloader metadata is used to configure the classloader for an individual bean or a whole deployment.

sect1.title: PropertyMetaData - configuring properties
sect1.para: The property metadata is used to configure individual bean property with values.

sect1.title: ParameterMetaData - configuring values passed to constructors or methods
sect1.para: The parameter metadata is used to pass values to constructors and methods.

sect1.title: SupplyMetaData - specifying the bean supplies a demand
sect1.para: The supply metadata is used to define what the bean supplies.

sect1.title: DemandMetaData - specifying the bean demands a dependency
sect1.para: The demand metadata is used to define what the bean demands.

sect1.title: ValueMetaData - configuring values
sect1.para: The value metadata is used to define values.

sect1.title: DependencyValueMetaData - defining named dependencies
sect1.para: An extension to the value metadata that treats the underlying value as the name of an entry in the Registry and returns the registry's registered object when asked for the value.
